pull.title: Remove libbitcoinconsensus
pull.body: This was deprecated in `v27.0`, for removal in `v28.0`. See discussion in PR #29189.

issue.title: build: Assume HAVE_CONFIG_H, Add IWYU pragma keep to bitcoin-config.h includes
issue.body:
The `bitcoin-config.h` includes have issues:

* The header is incompatible with iwyu, so the `IWYU pragma: keep` is needed. Compare the previous discussion in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29408#issuecomment-1948959711
* Guarding the includes by `HAVE_CONFIG_H` is verbose and brittle. Compare the previous discussion in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29404#discussion_r1483189853 . Now that most build config dependencies have been removed from low level headers, the benefits are questionable, and the guard can be removed.

issue.title: Implement 64 bit arithmetic op codes in the Script interpreter
issue.body:
This PR adds 64 bit arithmetic op codes to the Script interpreter.


This PR corresponds with this BIP proposal: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1538

This work is heavily borrowed from the elements implementation of 64 bit op codes: https://github.com/ElementsProject/elements/pull/1020

issue.title: Add OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY opcodes
issue.body:
Implementation of OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY, as per the [draft BIP](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1500).

This MR includes a test using the test vectors generated from the reference implementation in the BIP.
The implementation utilizes a caching strategy that hopefully alleviates concerns around resource usage like quadratic hashing.

This MR on purpose does not make any consensus changes yet. Activation of the proposed opcodes will be coordinated in an independent MR, probably combined with other opcodes (like OP_CAT and/or OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK).

(I'm not very familiar with checks and lints on here, so I'll try to address problems as they come. I have personally been able to compile and run the tests, but that usually is only the tip of the iceberg.)

events.body:
Concept ACK.

To fix MSVC build, suggesting:
```diff
--- a/build_msvc/libbitcoin_consensus/libbitcoin_consensus.vcxproj
+++ b/build_msvc/libbitcoin_consensus/libbitcoin_consensus.vcxproj
@@ -15,7 +15,6 @@
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\primitives\block.cpp" />
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\primitives\transaction.cpp" />
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\pubkey.cpp" />
-    <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\script\bitcoinconsensus.cpp" />
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\script\interpreter.cpp" />
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\script\script.cpp" />
     <ClCompile Include="..\..\src\script\script_error.cpp" />
```
